titleStmt.title: An account of the unjust proceedings, in some matters of difference, between Mr. Williams Collins and Isaac Marlow; by several persons who pretend upon plain evidence, to acquit the one, and to give their judgement against the other.
titleStmt.author: Marlow, Isaac.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Isaac Marlow. London, July 2. 1697.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
